text: The DFB-Pokal Frauen is the second most important tournament in women's football in Germany. It is the female version of the DFB-Pokal. It was founded in 1980. 1. FFC Frankfurt has been the most successful club in the tournament, winning 9 titles. The current champions are VfL Wolfsburg. == Wins by team == Club Champion Runner-up Eintracht Frankfurt 9 (1999, 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003, 2007, 2008, 2011, 2014) 5 VfL Wolfsburg 8 (2013, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021) 1 TSV Siegen 5 (1986, 1987, 1988, 1989, 1993) 5 FSV Frankfurt 5 (1985, 1990, 1992, 1995, 1996) 3 1\. FFC Turbine Potsdam 3 (2004, 2005, 2006) 4 FCR 2001 Duisburg 3 (1998, 2009, 2010) 3 Bergisch Gladbach 3 (1981, 1982, 1984) 1 Grün-Weiß Brauweiler 3 (1991, 1994, 1997) 1 Bayern Munich 1 (2012) 3 KBC Duisburg 1 (1983) 1 SC Sand 0 2 SGS Essen 0 2 FFC Flaesheim-Hillen 0 1 Hamburger SV 0 1 FF USV Jena 0 1 STV Lövenich 0 1 Eintracht Rheine 0 1 1\. title: DFB-Pokal Frauen
